sn22.3:4.2: * ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā mahākaccāno avantīsu viharati kuraraghare papāte pabbate.
sn22.3:4.3: Atha kho hāliddikāni gahapati yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.3:4.4: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn22.3:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho hāliddikāni gahapati āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.3:5.1: * ‘Okaṃ pahāya aniketasārī,
sn22.3:5.2: Gāme akubbaṃ muni santhavāni;
sn22.3:5.3: Kāmehi ritto apurakkharāno,
sn22.3:6.1: Imassa nu kho, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa kathaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti?
sn22.3:7.2: Rūpadhāturāgavinibandhañca pana viññāṇaṃ ‘okasārī’ti vuccati.
sn22.3:8.2: Rūpadhātuyā kho, gahapati, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā te tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn22.3:8.7: viññāṇadhātuyā kho, gahapati, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā te tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn22.3:10.2: Rūpanimittaniketavisāravinibandhā kho, gahapati, tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn22.3:10.8: dhammanimittaniketavisāravinibandhā kho, gahapati, tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn22.3:11.1: Kathañca, gahapati, gāme santhavajāto hoti?
sn22.3:11.2: Idha, gahapati, ekacco gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho viharati sahanandī sahasokī, sukhitesu sukhito, dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanā tesu yogaṃ āpajjati.
sn22.3:11.3: Evaṃ kho, gahapati, gāme santhavajāto hoti.
sn22.3:12.1: Kathañca, gahapati, gāme na santhavajāto hoti?
sn22.3:12.2: Idha, gahapati, bhikkhu gihīhi asaṃsaṭṭho viharati na sahanandī na sahasokī na sukhitesu sukhito na dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu na attanā tesu yogaṃ āpajjati.
sn22.3:12.3: Evaṃ kho, gahapati, gāme na santhavajāto hoti.
sn22.3:13.2: Idha, gahapati, ekacco kāmesu avigatarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho.
sn22.3:13.3: Evaṃ kho, gahapati, kāmehi aritto hoti.
sn22.3:14.2: Idha, gahapati, ekacco kāmesu vigatarāgo hoti vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipāso vigatapariḷāho vigatataṇho.
sn22.3:14.3: Evaṃ kho, gahapati, kāmehi ritto hoti.
sn22.3:15.3: ‘evaṃrūpo siyaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, evaṃvedano siyaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, evaṃsañño siyaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, evaṃsaṅkhāro siyaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, evaṃviññāṇo siyaṃ anāgatamaddhānan’ti.
sn22.3:16.2: Idha, gahapati, ekaccassa na evaṃ hoti:
sn22.3:16.3: ‘evaṃrūpo siyaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, evaṃvedano siyaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, evaṃsañño siyaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, evaṃsaṅkhāro siyaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, evaṃviññāṇo siyaṃ anāgatamaddhānan’ti.
sn22.3:17.1: Kathañca, gahapati, kathaṃ viggayha janena kattā hoti?
sn22.3:17.2: Idha, gahapati, ekacco evarūpiṃ kathaṃ kattā hoti:
sn22.3:17.16: Evaṃ kho, gahapati, kathaṃ viggayha janena kattā hoti.
sn22.3:18.1: Kathañca, gahapati, kathaṃ na viggayha janena kattā hoti?
sn22.3:18.2: Idha, gahapati, bhikkhu na evarūpiṃ kathaṃ kattā hoti:
sn22.3:18.5: Evaṃ kho, gahapati, kathaṃ na viggayha janena kattā hoti.
sn22.3:19.1: Iti kho, gahapati, yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā aṭṭhakavaggiye māgaṇḍiyapañhe:
sn22.3:21.1: Imassa kho, gahapati, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
